name: Testimonies
description:
This is mostly a text-based investigative game.
Three to five people are called to the interrogation room as witnesses in a certain case.
As an investigator, you find the true culprit of the case among these people.
You identify the real culprit based on their testimonies.

Find the liar.

If you can solve the case (identify the true culprit), your score will be added.
You will be promoted more and more depending on the score, starting with a sergeant.
Ultimately, please aim to become a CIA special investigator.

Leader board
This game supports STEAM leaderboards and displays the world's top 4 players.

Achievement
Each achievement unlocks when you are promoted to FBI or CIA.
